trans-unit.source: Returns all the existing proxy types.
trans-unit.target: 傳回所有現有的 Proxy 型別。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> of all the existing proxy types.
trans-unit.target: 所有現有 Proxy 型別的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.GetKnownProxyTypes%2A> method is used when proxy object generation is enabled for POCO entities.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.GetKnownProxyTypes%2A> Proxy 物件產生啟用 POCO 實體時，方法使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Requirements for Creating POCO Proxies](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dcdbf982-9b9d-4582-806a-64de4a1c03c8) and [Working with POCO Entities](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5e0fb82a-b6d1-41a1-b37b-c12db61629d3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[POCO 建立 Proxy 需求](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dcdbf982-9b9d-4582-806a-64de4a1c03c8)和[處理 POCO 實體](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5e0fb82a-b6d1-41a1-b37b-c12db61629d3)。

trans-unit.source: The key of the object to be found.
trans-unit.target: 要尋找之物件的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Returns an object that has the specified entity key.
trans-unit.target: 傳回具有指定之實體索引鍵的物件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is an instance of an entity type.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，它是實體類型的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.GetObjectByKey%2A> tries to retrieve an object that has the specified <xref:System.Data.EntityKey> from the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.GetObjectByKey%2A> 會嘗試從 <xref:System.Data.EntityKey> 擷取具有指定之 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager> 的物件。

trans-unit.source: If the object is currently not loaded into the object context, a query is executed in an attempt to return the object from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 如果此物件目前尚未載入物件內容中，系統就會執行查詢，以便嘗試從資料來源中傳回此物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Object Queries](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0768033c-876f-471d-85d5-264884349276).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[物件查詢](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0768033c-876f-471d-85d5-264884349276)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.GetObjectByKey%2A> raises an <xref:System.Data.ObjectNotFoundException> when the object cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到此物件時，<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.GetObjectByKey%2A> 就會引發 <xref:System.Data.ObjectNotFoundException>。

trans-unit.source: To avoid handling this exception, instead use the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.TryGetObjectByKey%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免處理這個例外狀況，請改用 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.TryGetObjectByKey%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: This method will return objects in the <xref:System.Data.EntityState.Deleted> state.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法將會傳回處於 <xref:System.Data.EntityState.Deleted> 狀態中的物件。

trans-unit.source: A temporary key cannot be used to return an object from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 暫存索引鍵無法用來從資料來源中傳回物件。

trans-unit.source: This example is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。

trans-unit.source: The example creates an <xref:System.Data.EntityKey> for an entity of the given type and then fetches an entity by key.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會針對給定型別的實體建立 <xref:System.Data.EntityKey>，然後依據索引鍵擷取實體。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="key" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="key" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The object is not found in either the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager" /> or the data source.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager" /> 或資料來源中找不到此物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the proxy object.
trans-unit.target: Proxy 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the entity type of the POCO entity associated with a proxy object of a specified type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回與所指定型別的 Proxy 物件相關聯的 POCO 實體的實體型別。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the associated POCO entity.
trans-unit.target: 相關聯 POCO 實體的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.GetObjectType%2A> method is used when proxy object generation is enabled for POCO entities.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.GetObjectType%2A> Proxy 物件產生啟用 POCO 實體時，方法使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Requirements for Creating POCO Proxies](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dcdbf982-9b9d-4582-806a-64de4a1c03c8) and [Working with POCO Entities](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5e0fb82a-b6d1-41a1-b37b-c12db61629d3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[POCO 建立 Proxy 需求](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dcdbf982-9b9d-4582-806a-64de4a1c03c8)和[處理 POCO 實體](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5e0fb82a-b6d1-41a1-b37b-c12db61629d3)。

trans-unit.source: Explicitly loads a related object when you are using POCO custom data classes.
trans-unit.target: 在您使用 POCO 自訂資料類別時，明確地載入相關的物件。

trans-unit.source: When using POCO custom data classes, related objects cannot be explicitly loaded like instances of entity types that are generated by the Entity Data Model tools.
trans-unit.target: 當使用 POCO 自訂資料類別，相關的物件不能明確地載入像 Entity Data Model 工具所產生的實體類型的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This is because the tools generate the navigation properties that return an <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> or <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> of related objects when <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load%2A> is called on a <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為這些工具會產生導覽屬性會傳回<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>或<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601>相關物件時<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load%2A>上呼叫<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>。

trans-unit.source: POCO entities can still be loaded by using lazy loading by setting the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContextOptions.LazyLoadingEnabled%2A> property to `true` on the instance of <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContextOptions> that is returned by the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.ContextOptions%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, or by using eager loading with the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Include%2A> method on the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>.
trans-unit.target: POCO 實體仍然可以藉由使用消極式載入設定載入<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContextOptions.LazyLoadingEnabled%2A>屬性`true`的執行個體上<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContextOptions>所傳回<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.ContextOptions%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，或使用積極式載入與<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Include%2A>方法<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>.

trans-unit.source: The entity for which related objects are to be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 要載入相關物件的目標實體。

trans-unit.source: The name of the navigation property that returns the related objects to be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 巡覽屬性的名稱，這個屬性會傳回要載入的相關物件。

trans-unit.source: Explicitly loads an object related to the supplied object by the specified navigation property and using the default merge option.
trans-unit.target: 由指定的巡覽屬性和使用預設合併選項，明確地載入所提供之物件的相關物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.LoadProperty%2A> method must be called to achieve explicit loading when you are using POCO custom data classes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.LoadProperty%2A>必須呼叫方法，以達到明確載入，當您使用 POCO 自訂資料類別。

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.LoadProperty%2A>, the related object can be accessed through the navigation properties of the source entity.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.LoadProperty%2A>，相關的物件可以透過來源實體的導覽屬性來存取。

trans-unit.source: When using POCO custom data classes, related objects cannot be explicitly loaded like instances of entity types that are generated by the Entity Data Model tools.
trans-unit.target: 當使用 POCO 自訂資料類別，相關的物件不能明確地載入像 Entity Data Model 工具所產生的實體類型的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This is because the tools generate the navigation properties that return an <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> or <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> of related objects when <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load%2A> is called on a <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為這些工具會產生導覽屬性會傳回<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>或<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601>相關物件時<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load%2A>上呼叫<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>。

trans-unit.source: POCO entities can still be loaded by using lazy loading by setting the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContextOptions.LazyLoadingEnabled%2A> property to `true` on the instance of <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContextOptions> that is returned by the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.ContextOptions%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, or by using eager loading with the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Include%2A> method on the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>.
trans-unit.target: POCO 實體仍然可以藉由使用消極式載入設定載入<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContextOptions.LazyLoadingEnabled%2A>屬性`true`的執行個體上<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContextOptions>所傳回<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.ContextOptions%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，或使用積極式載入與<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Include%2A>方法<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.LoadProperty%2A> method is called, objects are loaded into the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> by using the default <xref:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption> value of <xref:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption.AppendOnly>.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.LoadProperty%2A>呼叫方法時，會將物件載入<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext>使用預設<xref:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption>值<xref:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption.AppendOnly>。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="entity" /> is in a <see cref="F:System.Data.EntityState.Detached" />, <see cref="F:System.Data.EntityState.Added," /> or <see cref="F:System.Data.EntityState.Deleted" /> state,
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="entity" /> 的狀態為 <see cref="F:System.Data.EntityState.Detached" />、<see cref="F:System.Data.EntityState.Added," /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Data.EntityState.Deleted" />時。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="entity" /> 會附加到 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext" /> 的另一個執行個體。

trans-unit.target: 當使用 POCO 自訂資料類別，相關的物件不能明確地載入像 Entity Data Model 工具所產生的實體類型的執行個體。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="entity" /> 的狀態為 <see cref="F:System.Data.EntityState.Detached" />、<see cref="F:System.Data.EntityState.Added," /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Data.EntityState.Deleted" />時。

trans-unit.source: The source object for which related objects are to be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 要載入相關物件的來源物件。

trans-unit.source: A LINQ expression that defines the related objects to be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 定義要載入之相關物件的 LINQ 運算式。

trans-unit.source: Explicitly loads an object that is related to the supplied object by the specified LINQ query and by using the default merge option.
trans-unit.target: 由指定的 LINQ 查詢和使用預設的合併選項，明確地載入所提供之物件的相關物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.LoadProperty%2A> method must be called to achieve explicit loading when you are using POCO custom data classes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.LoadProperty%2A>必須呼叫方法，以達到明確載入，當您使用 POCO 自訂資料類別。

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.LoadProperty%2A>, the related object can be accessed through the navigation properties of the source entity.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.LoadProperty%2A>，相關的物件可以透過來源實體的導覽屬性來存取。

trans-unit.source: The property to load is specified by a LINQ expression, which must be in the form of a simple property member access, as in `(entity) => entity.PropertyName`, where *PropertyName* is the navigation property that returns the related objects to be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 要載入之屬性由 LINQ 運算式指定，必須為簡單的屬性成員存取，格式為`(entity) => entity.PropertyName`，其中*PropertyName*會傳回要載入相關的物件的導覽屬性。

trans-unit.source: An exception will occur if other forms of the LINQ expression are used.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用其他形式的 LINQ 運算式，會發生例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: When using POCO custom data classes, related objects cannot be explicitly loaded like instances of entity types that are generated by the Entity Data Model tools.
trans-unit.target: 當使用 POCO 自訂資料類別，相關的物件不能明確地載入像 Entity Data Model 工具所產生的實體類型的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This is because the tools generate the navigation properties that return an <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> or <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> of related objects when <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load%2A> is called on a <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為這些工具會產生導覽屬性會傳回<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>或<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601>相關物件時<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load%2A>上呼叫<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>。

trans-unit.target: POCO 實體仍然可以藉由使用消極式載入設定載入<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContextOptions.LazyLoadingEnabled%2A>屬性`true`的執行個體上<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContextOptions>所傳回<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.ContextOptions%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，或使用積極式載入與<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Include%2A>方法<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the metadata workspace used by the object context.
trans-unit.target: 取得內容物件所使用的中繼資料工作空間。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace" /> object associated with this <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 與這個 <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace" /> 相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace> class is a central runtime API that you can use to interact with the Entity Data Model (EDM) metadata in the context of an application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace> 類別是中央執行階段 API，可讓您用來在應用程式的內容中與 Entity Data Model (EDM) 中繼資料互動。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Metadata Workspace](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/601aee56-3eda-4caa-9082-a01df76c5e84).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[中繼資料工作空間](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/601aee56-3eda-4caa-9082-a01df76c5e84)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a new entity object is created from data in the data source as part of a query or load operation.
trans-unit.target: 在查詢或載入作業中從資料來源中的資料建立新的實體物件時發生。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised after all scalar, complex, and reference properties have been set on an object, but before collections are loaded.
trans-unit.target: 所有純量、 複雜之後, 會引發這個事件，並參考內容物件，但在載入集合之前，已設定。

trans-unit.source: If an object with the same key value exists in the object context, the Entity Framework will not recreate the object and this event will not be raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果具有相同索引鍵值的物件存在物件內容中，Entity Framework 將無法重新建立物件，並不會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object state manager used by the object context to track object changes.
trans-unit.target: 取得內容物件用來追蹤物件變更的物件狀態管理員。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager" /> used by this <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager" /> 所使用的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext" />。

trans-unit.source: These examples are based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832).
trans-unit.target: 這些範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。

trans-unit.source: This example gets the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager> from the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> and uses the state manager to access an object in the context.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會從 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager> 中取得 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> 並且使用此狀態管理員來存取內容中的物件。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager.TryGetObjectStateEntry%2A> method on the returned <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager> to get an object based on its entity key.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會針對傳回的 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager.TryGetObjectStateEntry%2A> 使用 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager> 方法，以便根據實體索引鍵取得物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the LINQ query provider associated with this object context.
trans-unit.target: 取得與這個物件內容相關聯的 LINQ 查詢提供者。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryProvider" /> instance used by this object context.
trans-unit.target: 這個物件內容所使用的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryProvider" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Updates specific objects in the object context with data from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 使用資料來源中的資料，更新物件內容中的特定物件。

trans-unit.source: The order in which objects are refreshed is nondeterministic.
trans-unit.target: 重新整理物件的順序不具決定性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.RefreshMode" /> value that indicates whether property changes in the object context are overwritten with property values from the data source.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.RefreshMode" /> 值，指出是否會以資料來源中的屬性值覆寫物件內容中的屬性變更。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> collection of objects to refresh.
trans-unit.target: 要重新整理之物件的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: Updates a collection of objects in the object context with data from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 使用資料來源中的資料，更新物件內容中的物件集合。

trans-unit.source: This method has the dual purpose of allowing objects in the object context to be refreshed with data from the data source, and being the mechanism by which conflicts can be resolved.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法具有雙重用途：允許使用資料來源中的資料來重新整理物件內容中的物件，以及成為用以解決衝突的機制。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Saving Changes and Managing Concurrency](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b8378601-4f26-4a05-a24a-f50aeb68610e).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[儲存的變更和管理並行](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b8378601-4f26-4a05-a24a-f50aeb68610e)。

trans-unit.source: The order in which objects are refreshed is nondeterministic.
trans-unit.target: 重新整理物件的順序不具決定性。

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.Refresh%2A> is called, the object’s original values will always be updated with the data source value, but the current values might or might not be updated with the data source value.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.Refresh%2A> 方法之後，雖然系統一定會使用資料來源的值來更新物件的原始值，但是不一定會使用資料來源的值來更新目前的值。

trans-unit.source: This depends on the <xref:System.Data.Objects.RefreshMode> value.
trans-unit.target: 這會因 <xref:System.Data.Objects.RefreshMode> 值而不同。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.RefreshMode.StoreWins> mode means that the objects in the collection should be updated to match the data source values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.RefreshMode.StoreWins>模式表示應該更新在集合中的物件，以符合資料來源的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Objects.RefreshMode.ClientWins> means that only the changes in the object context will be persisted, even if there have been other changes in the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.RefreshMode.ClientWins> 表示物件內容中的變更會保存，即使已有其他變更資料來源中。

trans-unit.source: To ensure that objects have been updated by data source-side logic, you can call <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.Refresh%2A> with <xref:System.Data.Objects.RefreshMode.StoreWins> after you call the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要確保物件已經由資料來源端邏輯所更新，您可以在呼叫 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.Refresh%2A> 方法之後，使用 <xref:System.Data.Objects.RefreshMode.StoreWins> 來呼叫 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="collection" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="collection" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="refreshMode" /> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="refreshMode" /> 無效。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="collection" /> is empty.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="collection" /> 是空的。

trans-unit.source: -or-
An object is not attached to the context.
trans-unit.target: 物件沒有附加至內容。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.RefreshMode" /> values that specifies which mode to use for refreshing the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager" />.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.RefreshMode" /> 值，它會指定要用於重新整理 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager" /> 的模式。

trans-unit.source: The object to be refreshed.
trans-unit.target: 要重新整理的物件。

trans-unit.source: Updates an object in the object context with data from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 使用資料來源中的資料，更新物件內容中的物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.Refresh%2A> has the dual purpose of allowing an object to be refreshed with data from the data source and being the mechanism by which conflicts can be resolved.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.Refresh%2A> 具有雙重用途：允許使用資料來源中的資料來重新整理物件，以及成為用以解決衝突的機制。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Saving Changes and Managing Concurrency](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b8378601-4f26-4a05-a24a-f50aeb68610e).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[儲存的變更和管理並行](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b8378601-4f26-4a05-a24a-f50aeb68610e)。

trans-unit.source: The order in which objects are refreshed is nondeterministic.
trans-unit.target: 重新整理物件的順序不具決定性。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.Refresh%2A> method is called, the object’s original values will always be updated with the data source value, but the current values might or might not be updated with the data source value.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.Refresh%2A> 方法之後，雖然系統一定會使用資料來源的值來更新物件的原始值，但是不一定會使用資料來源的值來更新目前的值。

trans-unit.source: This depends on the <xref:System.Data.Objects.RefreshMode>.
trans-unit.target: 這會因 <xref:System.Data.Objects.RefreshMode> 而不同。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.RefreshMode.StoreWins> mode means that the object should be updated to match the data source values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.RefreshMode.StoreWins> 模式表示此物件應該更新為符合資料來源的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.RefreshMode.ClientWins> value means that only the changes in the object context will be persisted, even if there have been other changes in the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.RefreshMode.ClientWins> 值表示只會保存物件內容中的變更，即使資料來源中已經有其他變更也一樣。

trans-unit.source: To ensure that an object has been updated by data source-side logic, you can call the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.Refresh%2A> method with the <xref:System.Data.Objects.RefreshMode.StoreWins> value after you call the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要確保物件已經由資料來源端邏輯所更新，您可以在呼叫 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.Refresh%2A> 方法之後，使用 <xref:System.Data.Objects.RefreshMode.StoreWins> 值來呼叫 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: This example is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。

trans-unit.source: The example tries to save changes, and this may cause a concurrency conflict.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會嘗試儲存變更，而且這可能會導致並行衝突。

trans-unit.source: Then it shows how to resolve the concurrency conflict by refreshing the object context before re-saving changes.
trans-unit.target: 然後，它會示範如何透過重新整理物件內容，然後重新儲存變更，解決並行衝突。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="collection" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="collection" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="refreshMode" /> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="refreshMode" /> 無效。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="collection" /> is empty.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="collection" /> 是空的。

trans-unit.source: -or-
An object is not attached to the context.
trans-unit.target: 物件沒有附加至內容。

trans-unit.source: Persists all updates to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 將所有更新保存至資料來源。

trans-unit.source: Persists all updates to the data source and resets change tracking in the object context.
trans-unit.target: 將所有更新保存至資料來源並且重設物件內容中的變更追蹤。

trans-unit.source: The number of objects in an <see cref="F:System.Data.EntityState.Added" />, <see cref="F:System.Data.EntityState.Modified" />, or <see cref="F:System.Data.EntityState.Deleted" /> state when <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges" /> was called.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 <see cref="F:System.Data.EntityState.Added" /> 時處於 <see cref="F:System.Data.EntityState.Modified" />、<see cref="F:System.Data.EntityState.Deleted" /> 或 <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges" /> 狀態中的物件數目。

trans-unit.source: To ensure that objects on the client have been updated by data source-side logic, you can call the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.Refresh%2A> method with the <xref:System.Data.Objects.RefreshMode.StoreWins> value after you call <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要確保用戶端的物件已經由資料來源端邏輯所更新，您可以在呼叫 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.Refresh%2A> 之後，使用 <xref:System.Data.Objects.RefreshMode.StoreWins> 值來呼叫 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Saving Changes and Managing Concurrency](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b8378601-4f26-4a05-a24a-f50aeb68610e).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[儲存的變更和管理並行](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b8378601-4f26-4a05-a24a-f50aeb68610e)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges%2A> operates within a transaction.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges%2A> 在交易內的運作方式。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges%2A> will roll back that transaction and throw an exception if any of the dirty <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry> objects cannot be persisted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges%2A> 將會回復該交易，並擲回例外狀況，如果任何一個中途<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry>無法保存物件。

trans-unit.source: If an optimistic concurrency violation has occurred, an <xref:System.Data.OptimisticConcurrencyException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果已經發生開放式並行存取違規，就會擲回 <xref:System.Data.OptimisticConcurrencyException>。

trans-unit.source: You can resolve an optimistic concurrency violation by catching it, calling the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.Refresh%2A> method with the <xref:System.Data.Objects.RefreshMode.StoreWins> or <xref:System.Data.Objects.RefreshMode.ClientWins> value, and then calling <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges%2A> again.
trans-unit.target: 您可以透過攔截開放式並行存取違規、使用 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.Refresh%2A> 或 <xref:System.Data.Objects.RefreshMode.StoreWins> 值來呼叫 <xref:System.Data.Objects.RefreshMode.ClientWins> 方法，然後再次呼叫 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges%2A>，解決開放式並行存取違規。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Manage Data Concurrency in the Object Context](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/25ffe70d-ce97-4f0a-8ae0-22b7c40f748a).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 管理物件內容中的資料並行](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/25ffe70d-ce97-4f0a-8ae0-22b7c40f748a)。

trans-unit.source: This example is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。

trans-unit.source: This example tries to save changes, which may cause a concurrency conflict.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會嘗試儲存可能導致並行衝突的變更。

trans-unit.source: Then, it demonstrates how to resolve the concurrency conflict by refreshing the object context before re-saving changes.
trans-unit.target: 然後，它會示範如何透過重新整理物件內容，然後重新儲存變更，解決並行衝突。

trans-unit.source: An optimistic concurrency violation has occurred in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 在資料來源中已經發生開放式並行存取 (Optimistic Concurrency) 違規。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is needed for client-side transaction support.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端異動支援需要這個參數。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="true" />, the change tracking on all objects is reset after <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges(System.Boolean)" /> finishes.
trans-unit.target: 如果為 <see langword="true" />，就會在 <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges(System.Boolean)" /> 完成之後，重設所有物件的變更追蹤。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="false" />, you must call the <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.AcceptAllChanges" /> method after <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges(System.Boolean)" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果為 <see langword="false" />，您就必須在 <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.AcceptAllChanges" /> 之後呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges(System.Boolean)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Persists all updates to the data source and optionally resets change tracking in the object context.
trans-unit.target: 將所有更新保存至資料來源，並且選擇性地重設物件內容中的變更追蹤。

trans-unit.source: The number of objects in an <see cref="F:System.Data.EntityState.Added" />, <see cref="F:System.Data.EntityState.Modified" />, or <see cref="F:System.Data.EntityState.Deleted" /> state when <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges" /> was called.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 <see cref="F:System.Data.EntityState.Added" /> 時處於 <see cref="F:System.Data.EntityState.Modified" />、<see cref="F:System.Data.EntityState.Deleted" /> 或 <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges" /> 狀態中的物件數目。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges%28System.Data.Objects.SaveOptions%29> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges%28System.Data.Objects.SaveOptions%29>方法改為。

trans-unit.source: An optimistic concurrency violation has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 已經發生開放式並行存取違規。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.SaveOptions" /> value that determines the behavior of the operation.
trans-unit.target: 決定作業行為的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.SaveOptions" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Persists all updates to the data source with the specified <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.SaveOptions" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.SaveOptions" />，將所有更新保存至資料來源。

trans-unit.source: The number of objects in an <see cref="F:System.Data.EntityState.Added" />, <see cref="F:System.Data.EntityState.Modified" />, or <see cref="F:System.Data.EntityState.Deleted" /> state when <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges" /> was called.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 <see cref="F:System.Data.EntityState.Added" /> 時處於 <see cref="F:System.Data.EntityState.Modified" />、<see cref="F:System.Data.EntityState.Deleted" /> 或 <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges" /> 狀態中的物件數目。

trans-unit.source: Use this specific overload of <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges%2A> to either make sure that <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.DetectChanges%2A> is called before you save changes to the data source or that <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.AcceptAllChanges%2A> is called after you save changes to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個特定的多載<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges%2A>可能是確保<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.DetectChanges%2A>之前，您將變更儲存至資料來源或是呼叫<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.AcceptAllChanges%2A>稱為之後您將變更儲存至資料來源。

trans-unit.source: This enumeration has a <xref:System.FlagsAttribute> that allows for a bitwise combination of its member values.
trans-unit.target: 這個列舉型別的<xref:System.FlagsAttribute>，允許其成員值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: To make sure that objects on the client have been updated by data source-side logic, you can call the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.Refresh%2A> method with the <xref:System.Data.Objects.RefreshMode.StoreWins> value after you call <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要確定用戶端上的物件，已由資料來源端邏輯所更新，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.Refresh%2A>方法<xref:System.Data.Objects.RefreshMode.StoreWins>值之後呼叫<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges%2A> method operates in a transaction.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges%2A>方法可在交易中運作。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges%2A> will roll back that transaction and throw an exception if any one of the dirty <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry> objects cannot be persisted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges%2A> 將會回復該交易，並擲回例外狀況，如果任何一個中途<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry>無法保存物件。

trans-unit.source: If an optimistic concurrency violation has occurred, an <xref:System.Data.OptimisticConcurrencyException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果已經發生開放式並行存取違規，就會擲回 <xref:System.Data.OptimisticConcurrencyException>。

trans-unit.source: You can resolve an optimistic concurrency violation by catching it, calling the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.Refresh%2A> method with the <xref:System.Data.Objects.RefreshMode.StoreWins> or <xref:System.Data.Objects.RefreshMode.ClientWins> values, and then calling the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges%2A> method again.
trans-unit.target: 您可以透過攔截開放式並行存取違規、使用 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.Refresh%2A> 或 <xref:System.Data.Objects.RefreshMode.StoreWins> 值來呼叫 <xref:System.Data.Objects.RefreshMode.ClientWins> 方法，然後再次呼叫 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges%2A> 方法，解決開放式並行存取違規。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Manage Data Concurrency in the Object Context](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/25ffe70d-ce97-4f0a-8ae0-22b7c40f748a).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 管理物件內容中的資料並行](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/25ffe70d-ce97-4f0a-8ae0-22b7c40f748a)。

trans-unit.source: An optimistic concurrency violation has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 已經發生開放式並行存取違規。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when changes are saved to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 當變更儲存至資料來源時發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SavingChanges> event is raised at the start of a <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges%2A> operation on an <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SavingChanges> 事件會針對 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges%2A> 在 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> 作業的開頭引發。

trans-unit.source: This event is typically used to validate changed objects before new values are written to the database.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件通常是在新值寫入資料庫之前，用來驗證變更的物件。

trans-unit.source: This example is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。

trans-unit.source: This registers a handler for the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SavingChanges> event that performs entity state validation.
trans-unit.target: 這會針對執行實體狀態驗證的 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SavingChanges> 事件註冊處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" /> that contains entity data to translate into entity objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" />，包含要轉譯為實體物件的實體資料。

trans-unit.source: Translates a <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" /> that contains rows of entity data to objects of the requested entity type.
trans-unit.target: 將包含實體資料之資料列的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" />，轉譯成所要求的實體型別。

trans-unit.source: An enumeration of objects of type <paramref name="TResult" />.
trans-unit.target: 型別為 <paramref name="TResult" /> 之物件的列舉。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.Translate%2A> method is used to translate entity data from a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader> into objects of the requested type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.Translate%2A>方法用來將實體資料從轉譯<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>為要求類型的物件。

trans-unit.source: This process is performed automatically when an <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> is executed to return entity data.
trans-unit.target: 此程序會自動執行時<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>會執行，以傳回實體資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.Translate%2A> method enables you to execute a standard ADO.NET query against a data source and translate the returned data rows into entity objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.Translate%2A>方法可讓您執行標準的 ADO.NET 查詢對資料來源，並將傳回的資料列轉譯成實體物件。

trans-unit.source: The supplied <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader> must contain data that maps to the requested entity type.
trans-unit.target: 提供<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>必須包含對應到要求的實體類型的資料。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see:
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱:

trans-unit.source: [Directly Executing Store Commands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5708d0a2-3f76-4825-978a-d06ff5c4bb3d) and
trans-unit.target: [直接執行存放區命令](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5708d0a2-3f76-4825-978a-d06ff5c4bb3d)和

trans-unit.source: [How to: Directly Execute Commands Against the Data Source](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/def3cc87-cfff-4dee-83cf-1a40c73a2d01)
trans-unit.target: [如何： 直接執行命令，針對資料來源](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/def3cc87-cfff-4dee-83cf-1a40c73a2d01)

trans-unit.source: When <paramref name="reader" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 當 <paramref name="reader" /> 為 <see langword="null" /> 時。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" /> that contains entity data to translate into entity objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" />，包含要轉譯為實體物件的實體資料。

trans-unit.source: The entity set of the <c>TResult</c> type.
trans-unit.target: <c>TResult</c> 類型的實體集。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption" /> to use when translated objects are added to the object context.
trans-unit.target: 在轉譯的物件加入至物件內容時所要使用的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption.AppendOnly" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption.AppendOnly" />。

trans-unit.source: Translates a <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" /> that contains rows of entity data to objects of the requested entity type, in a specific entity set, and with the specified merge option.
trans-unit.target: 在特定的實體集並使用指定的合併選項，將包含實體資料之資料列的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" /> 轉譯為所要求之實體型別的物件。

trans-unit.source: An enumeration of objects of type <paramref name="TResult" />.
trans-unit.target: 型別為 <paramref name="TResult" /> 之物件的列舉。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.Translate%2A> method is used to translate entity data from a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader> into objects of the requested type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.Translate%2A>方法用來將實體資料從轉譯<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>為要求類型的物件。

trans-unit.source: This process is performed automatically when an <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> is executed to return entity data.
trans-unit.target: 此程序會自動執行時<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>會執行，以傳回實體資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.Translate%2A> method enables you to execute a standard ADO.NET query against a data source and translate the returned data rows into entity objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.Translate%2A>方法可讓您執行標準的 ADO.NET 查詢對資料來源，並將傳回的資料列轉譯成實體物件。

trans-unit.source: The supplied <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader> must contain data that maps to the requested entity type.
trans-unit.target: 提供<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>必須包含對應到要求的實體類型的資料。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see:
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱:

trans-unit.source: [Directly Executing Store Commands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5708d0a2-3f76-4825-978a-d06ff5c4bb3d) and
trans-unit.target: [直接執行存放區命令](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5708d0a2-3f76-4825-978a-d06ff5c4bb3d)和

trans-unit.source: [How to: Directly Execute Commands Against the Data Source](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/def3cc87-cfff-4dee-83cf-1a40c73a2d01)
trans-unit.target: [如何： 直接執行命令，針對資料來源](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/def3cc87-cfff-4dee-83cf-1a40c73a2d01)

trans-unit.source: When <paramref name="reader" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 當 <paramref name="reader" /> 為 <see langword="null" /> 時。

trans-unit.source: When the supplied <paramref name="mergeOption" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 當提供的 <paramref name="mergeOption" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption" /> 值時。

trans-unit.source: When the supplied <paramref name="entitySetName" /> is not a valid entity set for the <paramref name="TResult" /> type.
trans-unit.target: 當提供的 <paramref name="entitySetName" /> 不是 <paramref name="TResult" /> 型別的有效實體集時。

trans-unit.source: The key of the object to be found.
trans-unit.target: 要尋找之物件的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the object.
trans-unit.target: 在這個方法傳回時，它會包含此物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns an object that has the specified entity key.
trans-unit.target: 傳回具有指定之實體索引鍵的物件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the object was retrieved successfully.
trans-unit.target: 如果擷取物件成功，則為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> if the <paramref name="key" /> is temporary, the connection is <see langword="null" />, or the <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="key" /> 是暫存的、連接為 <see langword="false" /> 或 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.TryGetObjectByKey%2A> tries to retrieve an object that has the specified <xref:System.Data.EntityKey> from the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.TryGetObjectByKey%2A> 會嘗試從 <xref:System.Data.EntityKey> 擷取具有指定之 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager> 的物件。

trans-unit.source: If the object is currently not loaded into the object context, a query is executed in an attempt to return the object from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 如果此物件目前尚未載入物件內容中，系統就會執行查詢，以便嘗試從資料來源中傳回此物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Object Queries](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0768033c-876f-471d-85d5-264884349276).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[物件查詢](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0768033c-876f-471d-85d5-264884349276)。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.TryGetObjectByKey%2A> method to avoid handling the <xref:System.Data.ObjectNotFoundException> raised by <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.GetObjectByKey%2A> when the object cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.TryGetObjectByKey%2A> 方法來避免處理找不到此物件時，<xref:System.Data.ObjectNotFoundException> 所引發的 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.GetObjectByKey%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This method will return objects in the <xref:System.Data.EntityState.Deleted> state.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法將會傳回處於 <xref:System.Data.EntityState.Deleted> 狀態中的物件。

trans-unit.source: A temporary key cannot be used to return an object from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 暫存索引鍵無法用來從資料來源中傳回物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.TryGetObjectByKey%2A> method applies the standard .NET `TryParse` pattern for the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.GetObjectByKey%2A> method, returning `false` when the <xref:System.Data.ObjectNotFoundException> is caught.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.TryGetObjectByKey%2A>方法適用於標準.NET`TryParse`圖樣<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.GetObjectByKey%2A>方法，傳回`false`時<xref:System.Data.ObjectNotFoundException>攔截。

trans-unit.source: The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832).
trans-unit.target: 本主題中的範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。

trans-unit.source: The example creates an <xref:System.Data.EntityKey> for an entity of the given type and then tries to retrieve an entity by key.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會針對給定型別的實體建立 <xref:System.Data.EntityKey>，然後嘗試依據索引鍵擷取實體。

trans-unit.source: Incompatible metadata for <paramref name="key" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="key" /> 的不相容中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="key" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="key" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。
